details.description: Console tables are perfect for entryways or behind sofas. Use them to display decorative items, lamps, or even as extra storage with baskets below.
A coffee table anchors the seating area. Choose one that complements your sofa, and style it with books, a tray, or a centerpiece for balance.
The sofa is the heart of the living room. Pick a comfortable and durable one. Arrange it facing the focal point (like a TV, fireplace, or window) and pair it with accent chairs for extra seating.
